description: Comfortable jacket in durable G-1000 and G-1000 Lite, a practical everyday garment that also works well in nature. Pre-shaped sleeves and fixed hood that sits snugly around your face. Two zippered side pockets. Zipper in the front with inner flap. Adjustment at the hem and buttoned sleeve cuffs. Can be waxed for added protection from wind and rain.
name: Fjallraven Sten Jacket - Mens
